title: Bootstrap will start before 17th or after 17th?

comments.body: After 17 th bald guy told in session 2
Lessgoo, and when do the classes start?
Or how long is the bootstrap atleast
Usually it lasts week as told by some seniors but not sure for us as we are already starting very late
bootstrap? as in web dev bootstrap or something else?
Bootstrap is a week long program at PES conducted on the first week freshers are here
bootstrap lasts a week , classes start immediately after that
